Returns: A a String representation of this EventObject.
toString().Description: Returns a String representation of this EventObject.

Parameters: Object: The object on which the Event initially occurred.

Returns: The object on which the Event initially occurred.
getSource().Description: The object on which the Event initially occurred.

ClassDesc: The root class from which all event state objects shall be derived. All Events are constructed with a reference to the object, the "source", that is logically deemed to be the object upon which the Event in question initially occurred upon.
